articles.title: China advances space mission with Europe amid ambitious exploration agenda - CGTN
articles.description: The development of in-orbit detectors for a joint China-Europe space mission has been completed, and they are poised for integration into a satellite platform located in Europe within the year, according to the mission's chief scientist.

articles.title: The Biggest Victim Of Europe's Anti-China EV Tariffs: The Mini Cooper - InsideEVs
articles.description: The Great Wall Motors-produced Mini Cooper Electric will be subject to the maximum 38.1% tariff.
